question: Who is the winner of the USD 150,000 Lindores Abbey Rapid Challenge chess title?
explanation:
Former World rapid champion from Russia, Daniil Dubov has clinched the USD 150,000 Lindores Abbey Rapid Challenge chess title.
The 24-year-old player won his compatriot Sergey Karjakin and Chinese No. 1 Ding Liren in last two matches. He gained victory over the American Grand Master Hikaru Nakamura in the final match 3-2. Dubov became the grandmaster at his 14th year and became a World rapid champion in the year 2018.
